item.description:
The purpose of this group is to share our spirituality and spiritual experience(s), discuss our paths and investigate the ideas and techniques of all spiritualities and traditions, particularly the Mystical Dimension.

Agenda:

  1. We go around the circle and discuss our paths and evolution.
  2. We also ask for suggested topics to discuss.
  3. There will usually be a short talk on some spiritual subject and we also ask for suggested topics to discuss.
  4. Occasionally we have other experts visit and give a talk.
  5. If someone in the group would like to give a talk or seminar, let me know.
item.how_to_find_us: Corner of Walden St and Mass Ave.
item.name: Intros, Discussion of our Paths & Spiritual Topics. Talk on subjects of interest
